text: You awaken on a deserted shore, your memories washed away with the tide.
A faint glow flickers beside you—a glass bottle half-buried in sand.
Inside the bottle is a rolled-up paper shimmering faintly.
A whisper echoes in your head: 'Follow the light to find your path…'
The message glows brightly, forming a trail of floating lights toward the forest.
The wind carries a voice—soft, guiding, familiar.
To the left, a dark forest looms. To the right, a faint firelight flickers in the distance.
You can still hear the sea behind you.
The glowing trail leads you into the woods. Strange symbols mark the trees.
You feel a presence watching.
A small spirit appears, wings shimmering like glass. 'You're not from this world, are you?'
It offers you a glowing flower.
You take the flower—it pulses warmly in your palm.
The spirit smiles. 'This will prove your kindness.'
You wander deeper into the dark woods. Whispers twist around you.
The path vanishes beneath thick fog.
A wooden gate stands before a small village.
A sleepy guard eyes you suspiciously.
'Travelers need a token of trust,' says the guard.
He glances at your hands expectantly.
Inside, a busy market hums with life. Merchants shout and barter.
One merchant drops his bag of gold nearby.
You return the merchant’s bag. He bows deeply and hands you a silver charm.
'May luck follow you, stranger.'
The guard lets you in. The village welcomes you as a traveler of light.
Under the moon, your new life in this world begins.
You live quietly among strangers, never discovering your true purpose.
But peace has its own reward.
Lost in the forest, you sink into the mist as your memories fade once more.
The sea never answers your cries.
